name: Balloon PopÂ® 2
description: Draw, pop and match balloons for explosive fun in this re-invented classic for the Nintendo 3DS! Use your power bar to draw star lines and start a balloon-popping chain reaction! Set up electrifying combos while outwitting obstacles to unlock items and power-ups! Help our Alien friend recover parts for his spaceship in his journey across Earth's wonderful seasons and holidays in Story mode! Explore a world of crafty brainteasers in Puzzle mode spanning over 200 levels. Challenge high scores specific to each stage in Endless mode or change it up with 4 unique games in Mini-games mode!
